mapper.select: SELECT BOARD1.BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND , BOARD_WRITE_DATE, CM_NO FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_WRITER, B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, B.BOARD_RECOMMEND , B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, B.CM_NO FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_VIEW_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND , BOARD_WRITE_DATE, CM_NO FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC) B ) BOARD1 WHERE BOARD1.R_NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
